text: {{Infobox settlement | name = Southern Zone | native_name = Zoba Debub ዞባ ደቡብ المنطقة الجنوبية | native_name_lang = | other_name = Regione del Sud | settlement_type = Zoba | image_skyline = | image_alt = | image_caption = | image_flag = | flag_alt = | image_seal = | seal_alt = | image_shield = | shield_alt = | nickname = | motto = | mottoeng = | image_map = Southern in Eritrea.svg | map_alt = | map_caption = Debub Region in Eritrea | pushpin_map = | pushpin_map_alt = | pushpin_map_caption = | coordinates = | coor_pinpoint = | coordinates_footnotes = | subdivision_type = Country | subdivision_name = Eritrea | subdivision_type1 = | subdivision_name1 = | subdivision_type2 = | subdivision_name2 = | established_title = | established_date = | founder = | parts_type = | parts_style = | parts = | p1 = | p2 = | seat_type = Capital | seat = Mendefera | government_footnotes = | leader_party = | leader_title = Administrator | leader_name = | unit_pref = Metric | area_footnotes = | area_total_km2 = 8,000 | area_land_km2 = | area_water_km2 = | area_water_percent = | area_note = | elevation_footnotes = | elevation_m = | population_footnotes = | population_total = 1,476,765 | population_as_of = | population_density_km2 = auto | population_demonym = | population_note = | timezone1 = | utc_offset1 = | timezone1_DST = | utc_offset1_DST = | postal_code_type = | postal_code = | area_code_type = | area_code = | iso_code = ER-DU | website = | footnotes = }} Southern Region is a region of Eritrea. It is also known as Debub Region. The capital city is Mendefera. The region was formed on 15 April 1996, from the historical provinces of Serae and Akele Guzai. Mount Soira , the highest point in Eritrea, is in the region. The region has the following subregions: * Adi Keyh Subregion * Adi Quala Subregion * Debarwa Subregion * Dekemhare Subregion * Hadidia Subregion * Kudo Be'ur Subregion * Mai-Mne Subregion * Mendefera Subregion * Segeneiti Subregion * Senafe Subregion * Tera-Emni Subregion * Tsorona Subregion * Shiketi Subregion Category:Regions of Eritrea Category:1996 establishments in Eritrea
title: Southern Region (Eritrea)
